title: Heat, fire and smoke in British Columbia produce extreme weather
content:
1. Heat, fire and smoke in British Columbia produce extreme weather  NBC News
  2. Wildfire amid record heat wave forces entire village in Canada to evacuate: "The whole town is on fire"  CBS News
  3. Town ravaged by wildfire after enduring Canada’s all-time hottest temps  Fox News
  4. B.C. three weeks ahead of schedule in wildfire activity; two reported deaths in Lytton  News 1130
  5. Canada's 'hottest village' consumed by forest fire after suffering days of extreme heat  South China Morning Post
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
